channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Verge needs maintaining and bush blocks view, 7th April
item.description:
The verge is a mess full of weeds. On the corner of haymakers road there is also a large bush that blocks your view when you are turning right - can this be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Haymakers Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole of Bayshill Rd is in a poor state with multiple potholes, 7th April
item.description:
You need to look at the whole length of Bayshill Road from Ladies College ( going up the hill with college on your left) as there are many damaged areas, potholes. The same applies when you turn right up Parabola Rd and then on into Overton Rd. Proper resurfacing ( no cowpat infills PLEASE!) is what's needed I feel
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes on narrow road so vehicles driving on verges,a number of potholes and movement of the carriageway through the gates and up the hill., 7th April
item.description:
Along Crippetts Lane (a no-through road) past pigs on the right, dog training field on left just before the metal gates each side of the road. When you go past the gates and the farm entrance on the right problems all the way up the lane with road movement,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crippetts Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Resurface urgently needed, 7th April
item.description:
This section of road is dangerously unsafe for all road users, especially cyclists and oncoming traffic. Most traffic east-bound is using the oncoming lane to avoid damaging their vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Craters in lane 1A40 westbound, 7th April
item.description:
Large unavoidable craters in road surface of lane 1 A40 westbound, unsafe for high-speed 70mph carriageway. This whole section of lane 1 needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Failed repair leading to pothole, 6th April
item.description:
Nearside of road outside bungalow heading towards Churchdown. This has been repaired multiple times most recently 2 months ago and has failed yet again. Can't someone repair it properly?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 323, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
